fields.name: area_id
fields.title: Area ID
fields.description: Must be an area_id from the agreed area hierarchy.

fields.name: age_group
fields.title: Age Group
fields.description: The age group. Must be either "Y000_014" (0-14 y), "Y015_999" (15+ y) or "Y000_999" (0+).

fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: The year in which data was collected.

fields.name: calendar_quarter
fields.title: Calendar Quarter
fields.description: The calendar quarter reflected the end of reporting period. Formatted as CY20XXQY, for example CY2020Q4 for end of December 2020.

fields.name: art_current
fields.title: Number on ART
fields.description: Number currently receiving ART at the end of reporting period.

fields.name: art_new
fields.title: Number newly initiated on ART
fields.description: Number newly initiated on ART during reporting period

fields.name: vl_tested_12mos
fields.title: Number VLS Tested
fields.description: The number of people who received a routine viral load test during the 12 months prior to the reporting period end date.

fields.name: vl_suppressed_12mos
fields.title: Number VLS
fields.description: The number of people who were virally suppressed among those who received a routine viral load test during the 12 months prior to the reporting period end date.

customConstraints.description: The total number of people who recieved a routine viral load test must be greater than the number among them who were virally supressed.

title: UNAIDS ART Programme Input
description: If data does not exist, please indicate so with the value "NA" and ignore any warning given by Excel.
